meanings.definition: A heraldic charge in the form of a saltire.
meanings.sent1: The sautoire on the shield represented courage and strength.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful sautoire necklace with pride.
meanings.sent3: The sautoire on the flag seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The sautoire of stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The sautoire stood out boldly against the background.

meanings.definition: A piece of jewelry in the shape of a saltire.
meanings.sent1: Her elegant sautoire sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: He gifted her a stunning sautoire pendant for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The sautoire added a touch of sophistication to her outfit.
meanings.sent4: The sautoire gleamed like a star on her neck.
meanings.sent5: The sautoire complemented her attire perfectly.

meanings.sent1: She carefully sautoired the ribbons to create a unique design.
meanings.sent2: The branches sautoire in the shape of a cross.
meanings.sent3: He sautoired the sticks together to make a makeshift tent.
meanings.sent4: The roads sautoire at the intersection.
meanings.sent5: The shadows sautoire on the ground in the evening light.
